name: DIY Multiple Colors Plated Glass Pendant Necklace - With Your Own Picture BN89
description:
DIY Multiple Colors Plated Glass Pendant Necklace - With Your Own Picture - BN89

Outter Size: 36X28mm

Inner (Glass) diameter: 1inch (25mm)

**With Glass Inserts

**With 24" Ball chain Necklace

Please Select Colors:
=============================
A - Genuine 18K Gold Plated
B - Silver(White Gold) Plated
C - Antique-Copper Plated
D - Antique-Bronze Plated

=============================

How to DIY:
1.Cut your picture into the size of the glass
2.Glue the picture onto the glass, wait till it dry. (use glaze or E6000)
3.Glue the glass onto the pendant tray, wait till it dry. (use glaze or E6000)
4.Hang it onto the necklace, done!

=============================
If you need more, please contact us via email.

We also offer Express shipping, contact us for detail.
